name: Croissants
description: Flaky and buttery croissants baked to perfection.
imgalttext: Two croissants sit on a black piece of slate in a kitchen, being dusted by powdered sugar.

name: Raspberry Dream Tart
description: Bite-sized buttery tarts filled with sweet raspberry compote and topped with almond crumble.
imgalttext: A top-down photo of a mixed-berry crumble.

name: Antipasto Platter
description: Savor a symphony of Italian flavors with our Antipasto Platter, featuring savory cured meats, marinated olives, mozzarella cheese, and more—a culinary journey in every bite.

name: Chocolate Chunk Cookies
description: Large, gooey cookies packed with rich chocolate chunks and a hint of sea salt.

name: Lemon Zest Eclair
description: A light éclair filled with zesty lemon cream and lovingly dusted with finely powdered sugar.

name: Seasonal Fruit Platter
description:
Experience nature's sweetness with our Seasonal* Fruit Platter, a vibrant mix of fresh and dried fruits, juicy berries, crisp apples, and the best of the season—perfect for refreshing snacking and events.

*Fruit selection may vary depending on season

name: Cinnamon Swirl Delight
description: A flaky pastry twisted with layers of cinnamon and sugar, drizzled with vanilla glaze.
